title: BOC wants to create Add Cs on behalf of the club
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as BOC
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to player's Contract History widget
custom_expected:
THEN user can create a new Addendum C from this page
AND the Add C opens in Edit mode

title: BOC wants an error if creating an Add C for a player without an active minor contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is BOC
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to a player profile
AND that player does not have an active minor contract
custom_expected:
THEN show hard error:
**Title:** Error
**Body:** The Player does not have an active minor league contract.
**Button:** Back

title: BOC wants to access single Add Cs from Player Profile from Add C widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as BOC
custom_steps:
1. WHEN the user clicks the contents of the Status column in the BOC add C widget

2. WHEN the user clicks the contents of the Player column in the Club and Player e-sig widgets

3. WHEN the user clicks the contents of the Player column in the Add C widget
custom_expected:
1. THEN user is taken to the corresponding Addendum C
    AND it opens in view mode

2. THEN the user is taken to the Player Profile-Player History page

3. THEN the user is taken to the Player History page

title: BOC wants to see flags on a single Add C
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is BOC
AND there is an Add C with flags present on the multi-C widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user opens that single Addendum C
AND the Add C is in Pending Approval state
custom_expected: THEN user can see all flags in a pop-out on the right of the screen

title: BOC wants a flag if Add C has additional text
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is BOC
custom_steps: WHEN user views an Add C with additional text
custom_expected:
THEN a flag will show on the single Add C
AND a flag will show on the Approvals clipboard

title: Remove time stamp and switch to club Nickname for Approvals Widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is BOC
custom_steps: WHEN user views the Approvals widget
custom_expected:
THEN there should be no timestamp
AND the club nicknames (can be checked in Ebis 1) should be present in the From and To columns

title: BOC wants to edit Addendum Cs on behalf of club
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is BOC
custom_expected:
THEN user can open any Add C
AND user can edit any field in a non-Approved state
AND if Add C is Approved, then user can only edit attachments or comments
AND user gets e-sig related warning as implemented in https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/107846100 and https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/108237110

title: BOC wants to add secret notes to an Add C
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is BOC
custom_steps: WHEN user views a single Add C
custom_expected:
THEN there is a comments section and a 'BOC Notes' section
AND the entire section is not visible to a club user
AND the field is visible is both view and edit mode
AND BOC can edit and save this field in any state

title: BOC wants to tender or submit an Add C on behalf of the club
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is BOC
AND is viewing an Add C in Preliminary state
custom_steps:
WHEN the user Tenders the Add C, then the following rule checks are run:
(https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/106791616)

[19.2](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/65831)
[19.7](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/65833)
[19.9](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/65834)
[19.10](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/65835)
[19.11](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/65490)
[19.12](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/65849)
[19.13](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/65850)

AND when the Add C is Tendered and the user Submits the Add C, then the following rule checks are run:
(https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/106791616)

[19.14](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/65959)
[19.20](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/65952)
custom_expected: AND all warnings are overridable except for 19.20

title: BOC wants to see Add Cs that are not auto-approved on clipboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is BOC
AND there are Addendum Cs in Pending state
custom_expected:
THEN those Add Cs should show up on the Approvals clipboard with Date, From, Name, Position, Type, Level, Status, Attachments, and Flags columns
AND Addendum Cs will shows as Type: "Addendum Cs"

title: BOC wants to send a single C back for updates
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is BOC
AND user is viewing an Add C in Tendered or Pending Approval states
custom_expected:
THEN user can see a 'Return to Club' option above the Approve button
AND this option puts the Add C back in Preliminary state without running any rule chekcs
AND any attachment with the label 'Addendum C' is deleted
AND the form reloads in view mode

title: Clubs wants to ensure that Add C's sent back to club have signatures deleted
custom_preconds: http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/80162&group_by=cases:section_id&group_order=asc&group_id=13431
custom_steps:
WHEN user logs in as club that player from preconditions belongs to
AND opens up the single C rejected in preconditions
AND clicks E-sign
custom_expected:
THEN the generating PDF screen appears
AND the user does not see an E-sig status screen until they close the Generating PDF screen and click E-sign again

title: BOC wants to delete an Addendum C
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is BOC
AND is viewing an Add C in Preliminary, Tendered, or Pending Approval states
custom_expected:
THEN user can see a 'Delete' button to the left of 'Save/Edit'
AND this button triggers a warning:
Title: Warning
Body: Are you sure you want to delete this [form]? ("Form" to be replaced with Addendum C)
Hint: This is a permanent action that cannot be undone.
Buttons: Yes, No

title: BOC wants to print single Cs in any state
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is BOC
custom_steps: WHEN user opens an Add C in any state
custom_expected: THEN user can see and use a Print option above e-sign in any state

title: BOC wants to move an Add C back to Preliminary from the Multi-C widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is BOC
AND is viewing the multi-C widget
custom_steps: WHEN user selects 'Tendered' or 'Pending' Addendum Cs
custom_expected:
THEN user can click 'Return to Club' to the left of the split PDF button
AND the button is not active if other states are selected 
AND the Add Cs will move back to Preliminary status
AND no rule checks are run
AND the Add C attachment is delted
AND a blue notification is triggered
AND the club receives an action item

title: Clubs want an action item if an Add C is sent back for updating
custom_preconds: GIVEN that BOC has returned an Add C to the club
custom_steps: WHEN user logs in as club
custom_expected:
THEN they will receive an action item for that returned Add C 
AND the 'Type' is Addendum C
AND the Description is 'Addendum C sent back for updating'
AND it will remain on the  clipboard until that Add C reaches 'Pending' state again

title: BOC wants to approve a single Add C
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is BOC
AND user is viewing a single Add C
AND that Add C is Pending, Tendered or Preliminary
custom_expected:
THEN user can see a blue Approve button to the left of all other buttons
AND it is available in view and edit mode
AND if it is pressed in Edit mode, any changes are saved and the form reloads in view mode
AND all rule checks are run as if from the multi-C widget ([overridable warnings](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/suites/view/1363&group_by=cases:section_id&group_order=asc&group_id=11989) and [hard errors](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/suites/view/1363&group_by=cases:section_id&group_order=asc&group_id=11988))
AND the Add C shows up black in contract history
AND blue notification appears

title: BOC wants to approve an Add C from the clipboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is BOC
AND there are one or more pending Add Cs on the Approval clipboard
custom_steps: WHEN user selects pending Add Cs from the clipboard
custom_expected:
THEN the approve button is enabled
AND approval works the same as from the other places http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/80168
AND the associated PDF is stamped with the approvers signature
AND a blue notification appears

title: BOC wants to attach files to an approved Single C
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is BOC
custom_steps: WHEN user views an Approved Add C
custom_expected:
THEN the user is able to attach files
AND delete attachments

title: Update Paragraph 2 salary formula
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is tendering an Add C
AND that player has a MJ contract with a P2 salary
custom_expected:
THEN calculate the [P2 salary error](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/106044746), [flag](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/106791888) and ['Enter Salary'](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/108470672) feature as follows:

For each level of play:
Salary = (P2 amount from MJC / # of days in the season) X 30

title: Clubs want to be stopped from creating an Add C if another preliminary Add C exists
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND is viewing the profile for a player that has a preliminary Add C
custom_steps: WHEN user tries to create a new Add C
custom_expected:
THEN show hard error:

Title: Error
Body: A preliminary Addendum C already exists for this player
Button: Back

AND this rule is triggered on clicking the Addendum C option in the Create new menu

title: Clubs want to withdraw forms from e-signature
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND is viewing a single Add C that has been sent for e-signature
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Cancel E-Signature" from the e-sig status screen
custom_expected:
THEN an 'are you sure' message is prompted: 

Title - Are you sure?
Text - This will withdraw this form from e-signature state and all signatures will be erased.
Buttons - Yes, No

AND clicking the Yes button should withdraw the form from e-sig state and close the modal. The user should be able to restart the E-sig process from the beginning
AND clicking No takes user back to e-sig status screen

title: Update Paragraph 2 salary formula
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is tendering an Add C
AND that player has a MJ contract with a P2 salary
custom_expected:
THEN calculate the [P2 salary error](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/106044746), [flag](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/106791888) and ['Enter Salary'](https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/108470672) feature as follows:

For each level of play:
Salary = (P2 amount from MJC / # of days in the season) X 30

title: Clubs want to see contracts differentiated by row color in Contract History
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND viewing a player's contract history
AND that player has at least one minor and one major league contract
custom_expected:
THEN all the MNC elements alternate colors with the next MNC and its elements
AND all MJC elements alternate colors with the next MJC and its elements.

Minor Contract Colors: #F6FAFF, #EDF2F9
Major Contract Colors: #FFFFFF, #F6F6F6

title: Clubs want to filter contract history
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the contract history widget
custom_expected:
THEN there is a header that allows the user to filter by

Major Contracts,
Minor Contracts,
and Addendum C

title: Changes to Contract History
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is viewing the Contract History widget
custom_expected:
THEN there is a new column to the right of the Add G column titled 'Count FA'
AND the Signing Org/Club column uses minor league club nickname instead of abbreviation

title: Clubs want to create and save a a preliminary non-first year contract from Contract History
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND is viewing a pro player profile
custom_steps: WHEN the user hits "Create New"
custom_expected:
THEN a new contract creation form opens in edit mode
AND the user can save a preliminary version of the contract record
AND it can be reopened from Contract History
AND the buttons at the bottom behave according to global acceptance criteria

title: Clubs want to be stopped from creating a contract if the player isn't a free agent or doesn't belong to the club
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in boc

OR use is logged in as a club
AND is viewing the profile of a player whose current or Pending org is the same as the user's

OR if player's current or pending org is blank
custom_expected:
THEN user can create a new contract for that player. If any of the above conditions are false, user cannot create a new contract, and hard error shows:

Message:
Error: You do not have permission to create a contract for a player that belongs to another Organization.
Hint: If you believe you have received this message in error, please contact the BOC.

title: Clubs I want to see the status of their contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND is viewing a minor contract
custom_expected:
THEN there is a status indicator at the top of the contract indicating its status
AND in preliminary state, the status and the symbol are red.

title: Clubs want to be stopped from creating a contract if the player isn't a free agent or doesn't belong to the club
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in boc

OR use is logged in as a club
AND is viewing the profile of a player whose current or Pending org is the same as the user's

OR if player's current or pending org is blank
custom_expected:
THEN user can create a new contract for that player. If any of the above conditions are false, user cannot create a new contract, and hard error shows:

Message:
Error: You do not have permission to create a contract for a player that belongs to another Organization.
Hint: If you believe you have received this message in error, please contact the BOC.

title: Clubs want to create and save a a preliminary non-first year contract from Contract History
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND is viewing a pro player profile
custom_steps: WHEN the user hits "Create New"
custom_expected:
THEN a new contract creation form opens in edit mode
AND the user can save a preliminary version of the contract record
AND it can be reopened from Contract History
AND the buttons at the bottom behave according to global acceptance criteria

title: Clubs want to see a Player Summary on the contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
custom_steps: AND is viewing a new minor league contract
custom_expected:
THEN the user can see the Minor League Contract > Non-First Year contract header
AND can see the collapsible Summary section header and all fields under the Player SUmmary section
AND all columns are implemented as per the Data discover
AND user can save or cancel changes to the address fields
AND required fields have asterisks

title: Users want to open an eBis link in a new tab/window
custom_steps: WHEN user opens a link in a new tab/window, the link opens properly under the same login.
